sentences: Chair El Ghaouth (Mauritania) suggested that work on a draft decision on matters related to the consideration of non-Annex I communications continue in the drafting group.
The G-77/CHINA said it was clear from the agreement at COP-4 that second national communications would be funded without further guidelines.
El Ghaouth said the costs related to this draft decision would be met by extra budgetary sources.

He added that SBI would consider on Monday the decision currently being discussed in the drafting group, the issue of the contingency budget for non-Annex I communications, and a decision on the compilation and synthesis of initial communications.
enb_long_title: Fifth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
